DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Time Sheet for Selected Period
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Click on Time to mark it as keyed-in Dynamics","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":12,"WidgetRows":21,"WidgetColumns":48,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select	t.Company,
		t.Friday,
		t.FridayHours,
		t.FridayTotal,
		t.FridayVariance,
		t.InternalCategory,
		t.Monday,
		t.MondayHours,
		t.MondayTotal,
		t.MondayVariance,
		t.ProductExternalId,
		t.Saturday,
		t.SaturdayHours,
		t.SaturdayTotal,
		t.SaturdayVariance,
		t.Sunday,
		t.SundayHours,
		t.SundayTotal,
		t.SundayVariance,
		t.Thursday,
		t.ThursdayHours,
		t.ThursdayTotal,
		t.ThursdayVariance,
		t.Tuesday,
		t.TuesdayHours,
		t.TuesdayTotal,
		t.TuesdayVariance,
		t.[Type],
		t.[User],
		t.UserType,
		t.Wednesday,
		t.WednesdayHours,
		t.WednesdayTotal,
		t.WednesdayVariance,
		t.WeekHours,
		t.WeekVariance,
	case when t.InternalCategory = 'Holiday' then 'HOLIDAY'
	when t.InternalCategory = 'Administrative' then 'LOCAL OVERHEAD'
	when t.Type = 'Leave' then t.InternalCategory
	else cat.Category end Category
	from ( 
	SELECT	[Type] ,t.Company , t.ProductExternalId , u.[Name] as [User], ut.Name as UserType, MAX(IIF(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, [Date]) = 1, [Date], NULL)) AS Monday , 
			MAX(IIF(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, [Date]) = 2, [Date], NULL)) AS Tuesday , 
			MAX(IIF(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, [Date]) = 3, [Date], NULL)) AS Wednesday , 
			MAX(IIF(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, [Date]) = 4, [Date], NULL)) AS Thursday , 
			MAX(IIF(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, [Date]) = 5, [Date], NULL)) AS Friday , 
			MAX(IIF(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, [Date]) = 6, [Date], NULL)) AS Saturday , 
			MAX(IIF(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, [Date]) = 7, [Date], NULL)) AS Sunday , 
			ABS(SUM(IIF(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, [Date]) = 1, [Hours], NULL))) AS MondayHours, 
			ABS(SUM(IIF(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, [Date]) = 2, [Hours], NULL))) AS TuesdayHours , 
			ABS(SUM(IIF(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, [Date]) = 3, [Hours], NULL))) AS WednesdayHours , 
			ABS(SUM(IIF(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, [Date]) = 4, [Hours], NULL))) AS ThursdayHours , 
			ABS(SUM(IIF(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, [Date]) = 5, [Hours], NULL))) AS FridayHours , 
			ABS(SUM(IIF(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, [Date]) = 6, [Hours], NULL))) AS SaturdayHours , 
			ABS(SUM(IIF(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, [Date]) = 7, [Hours], NULL))) AS SundayHours , 
			ABS(SUM(SUM([Hours])) OVER (PARTITION BY u.[Name])) AS WeekHours, 
			SUM(SUM([DynamicsHours])) OVER (PARTITION BY u.[Name]) - ABS(SUM(SUM([Hours])) OVER (PARTITION BY u.[Name])) AS WeekVariance, 
			ABS(SUM(IIF(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, [Date]) = 1, [DynamicsHours], NULL))) - ABS(SUM(IIF(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, [Date]) = 1, [Hours], NULL))) AS MondayVariance, 
			ABS(SUM(IIF(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, [Date]) = 2, [DynamicsHours], NULL))) - ABS(SUM(IIF(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, [Date]) = 2, [Hours], NULL))) AS TuesdayVariance, 
			ABS(SUM(IIF(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, [Date]) = 3, [DynamicsHours], NULL))) - ABS(SUM(IIF(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, [Date]) = 3, [Hours], NULL))) AS WednesdayVariance, 
			ABS(SUM(IIF(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, [Date]) = 4, [DynamicsHours], NULL))) - ABS(SUM(IIF(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, [Date]) = 4, [Hours], NULL))) AS ThursdayVariance, 
			ABS(SUM(IIF(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, [Date]) = 5, [DynamicsHours], NULL))) - ABS(SUM(IIF(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, [Date]) = 5, [Hours], NULL))) AS FridayVariance, 
			ABS(SUM(IIF(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, [Date]) = 6, [DynamicsHours], NULL))) - ABS(SUM(IIF(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, [Date]) = 6, [Hours], NULL))) AS SaturdayVariance, 
			ABS(SUM(IIF(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, [Date]) = 7, [DynamicsHours], NULL))) - ABS(SUM(IIF(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, [Date]) = 7, [Hours], NULL))) AS SundayVariance,
			SUM(SUM(IIF(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, [Date]) = 1, [Hours], NULL))) OVER (PARTITION BY u.[Name]) as MondayTotal,
			SUM(SUM(IIF(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, [Date]) = 2, [Hours], NULL))) OVER (PARTITION BY u.[Name]) as TuesdayTotal,
			SUM(SUM(IIF(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, [Date]) = 3, [Hours], NULL))) OVER (PARTITION BY u.[Name]) as WednesdayTotal,
			SUM(SUM(IIF(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, [Date]) = 4, [Hours], NULL))) OVER (PARTITION BY u.[Name]) as ThursdayTotal,
			SUM(SUM(IIF(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, [Date]) = 5, [Hours], NULL))) OVER (PARTITION BY u.[Name]) as FridayTotal,
			SUM(SUM(IIF(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, [Date]) = 6, [Hours], NULL))) OVER (PARTITION BY u.[Name]) as SaturdayTotal,
			SUM(SUM(IIF(DATEPART(WEEKDAY, [Date]) = 7, [Hours], NULL))) OVER (PARTITION BY u.[Name]) as SundayTotal,
			t.InternalCategory
	FROM	( 
		SELECT	'Actual Time' AS [Type] ,atim.Company ,pro.ExternalId AS ProductExternalId ,tim.CreatedBy as UserId, atim.[User] ,atim.[Date] , 
				DATEPART(WEEKDAY, atim.[Date]) AS Weekday ,SUM(atim.ActualTime) AS Hours, NULL AS LeaveType ,0 AS IsInDynamics , 
				MAX(IIF(tim.Accommodation = 1, 1, 0)) AS IsKeyedInDynamics, 0 as DynamicsHours, pro.ExternalId as InternalCategory 
		FROM	Timesheet tim LEFT OUTER JOIN CommercialClientProduct pro ON pro.Oid = tim.Product ,
				Analytics.DatamartTimesheet atim 
		WHERE	tim.Oid = atim.Oid AND atim.AdministrativeTime = 0 AND atim.[Date] >= @FromDate and atim.[Date] < @ToDate 
		GROUP BY atim.Company ,pro.ExternalId ,tim.CreatedBy, atim.[User] ,atim.[Date] 
		UNION ALL 
		select	'Actual Time' AS [Type], c.name as Company, dyn.Project_ID as ProductExternalId, u.Oid as Userid, 
				ssu.UserName as [User], dyn.Transaction_date as [Date], DATEPART(WEEKDAY, dyn.Transaction_date) AS Weekday, 
				0 as Hours, null as LeaveType, 1 as IsInDynamics, 0 as IsKeyedInDynamics, 
				sum(dyn.Hours) as DynamicHours, dyn.Project_ID as InternalCategory 
		from	[CustomTables].[GSPATimesheet] dyn, [User] u, Company c, SecuritySystemUser ssu 
		where	dyn.E_mail = u.Mail and u.Company = c.Oid and dyn.Project_ID <> 'HOUSE-ADMIN' 
				and u.Oid = ssu.Oid and dyn.Transaction_date >= @FromDate and dyn.Transaction_date < @ToDate 
		group by c.Name, dyn.Project_ID, u.Oid, ssu.UserName, dyn.Transaction_date 
		UNION ALL 
		SELECT	'Administrative' AS [Type] ,atim.Company ,'HOUSE-ADMIN' AS ProductExternalId , tim.CreatedBy as UserId, atim.[User] , atim.[Date] ,
				DATEPART(WEEKDAY, atim.[Date]) AS [Weekday] ,SUM(atim.AdministrativeTime) AS [Hours] ,NULL AS LeaveType , 
				0 AS IsInDynamics ,MAX(IIF(tim.Accommodation = 1, 1, 0)) AS IsKeyedInDynamics, 0 as DynamicHours, 'Administrative' as InternalCategory 
		FROM	Timesheet tim ,Analytics.DatamartTimesheet atim 
		WHERE	tim.Oid = atim.Oid AND atim.AdministrativeTime != 0 AND atim.[Date] >= @FromDate and atim.[Date] < @ToDate 
		GROUP BY atim.Company ,tim.CreatedBy, atim.[User] ,atim.[Date] 
		UNION ALL 
		select	'Administrative' AS [Type], c.name as Company, dyn.Project_ID as ProductExternalId, u.Oid as Userid, ssu.UserName as [User], 
				dyn.Transaction_date as [Date], DATEPART(WEEKDAY, dyn.Transaction_date) AS Weekday, 0 as Hours, null as LeaveType, 
				1 as IsInDynamics, 0 as IsKeyedInDynamics, sum(dyn.Hours) as DynamicHours, dyn.Project_ID as InternalCategory 
		from	[CustomTables].[GSPATimesheet] dyn, [User] u, Company c, SecuritySystemUser ssu 
		where	dyn.E_mail = u.Mail and u.Company = c.Oid and dyn.Project_ID = 'HOUSE-ADMIN' and u.Oid = ssu.Oid and dyn.Transaction_date >= @FromDate and dyn.Transaction_date < @ToDate 
		group by c.Name, dyn.Project_ID, u.Oid, ssu.UserName, dyn.Transaction_date 
		UNION ALL 
		SELECT	'Holiday' AS [Type] ,com.[Name] AS Company ,'HOUSE-ADMIN' AS ProductExternalId , u.Oid as UserId, u.[Name] AS [User] ,hld.[Date] ,
				DATEPART(WEEKDAY, hld.[Date]) AS Weekday ,
				SUM(u.RequiredHours) - (select sum((t.DurationHours + (t.DurationMinutes / cast(60 as float)))) from Timesheet t where t.CreatedBy = u.Oid and t.[Date] = hld.[Date]) AS Hours, 
				NULL AS LeaveType ,1 AS IsInDynamics ,1 AS IsKeyedInDynamics, 
				0 as DynamicHours, 'Holiday' as InternalCategory 
		FROM	Holiday hld ,[User] u ,Company com 
		WHERE	u.Company = com.Oid AND hld.[Date] >= @FromDate AND hld.[Date] < @ToDate 
		GROUP BY com.[Name] ,u.Oid, u.[Name] ,hld.[Date] 
		UNION ALL 
		SELECT	'Leave' AS [Type] ,com.[Name] AS Company ,'HOUSE-ADMIN' AS ProductExternalId ,u.Oid as UserId, u.[Name] AS [User] , lvs.[Day] AS [Date] ,
				DATEPART(WEEKDAY, lvs.[Day]) AS Weekday ,SUM(lvs.TotalMinutes / 60.0) AS Hours ,
				uvt.[Name] AS LeaveType , 1 AS IsInDynamics ,1 AS IsKeyedInDynamics, 0 as DynamicHours, 
				case when uvt.Name = 'Bereavement' then 'Bereavement'
				when uvt.Name = 'Community Service' then 'EARLY CLOSINGS'
				when uvt.Name = 'Disability/MAT/PAT' then 'LONG TERM DISABILITY'
				when uvt.Name = 'Freelance Sick Time' or uvt.Name = 'Sick' then 'SICK LEAVE'
				when uvt.Name = 'Freelance Unpaid OOO' or uvt.Name = 'Unpaid Leave of Absence' then 'UNPAID TIME OFF'
				when uvt.Name = 'Personal/Get a Life' then 'PERSONAL'
				when uvt.Name = 'Vacation' then 'VACATION'
				else 'COMP DAY' end as InternalCategory 
		FROM	UserVacation lvs ,UserInfoVacation uiv ,UserVacationType uvt ,[User] u ,Company com 
		WHERE	u.Company = com.Oid AND u.Oid = lvs.[User] AND uiv.Oid = lvs.UserInfoVacation AND uvt.Oid = uiv.UserVacationType AND lvs.[Day] >= @FromDate AND lvs.[Day] < @ToDate 
		GROUP BY com.[Name] ,u.Oid, u.[Name] ,uvt.[Name] ,lvs.[Day] ) t left join [User] u on (t.UserId = u.Oid) left outer join UserType ut on (u.UserType = ut.Oid)
		GROUP BY [Type] ,t.Company ,t.ProductExternalId ,u.[Name], ut.Name, t.InternalCategory)t 
		left outer join (
			select distinct ccp.ExternalId, Convert(nvarchar(500), ccu.[Dynamics Category]) as Category from CommercialClientProduct ccp, CommercialClientProduct_UserFields ccu 
			where ccp.Active=1 and ccp.Oid = ccu.Oid)cat on cat.ExternalId = t.ProductExternalId","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["startDate","endDate"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Overall Status
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters: [{"WidgetSubTitle":"Time in Dynamics vs Keyed in Dynamics vs not in Dynamics","WidgetType":"chart","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#ffffff","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":0,"WidgetRows":12,"WidgetColumns":12,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"queryText","value":" select 'Not in Dynamics' as NotInDynamics, 'In Dynamics' as InDynamics, 'Keyed in Dynamics' as KeyedInDynamics, sum(iif(tim.Accommodation = 0, atim.ActualTime, 0)) as IsNotInDynamics, sum(iif(tim.Accommodation = 1, atim.ActualTime, 0)) as IsInDynamics, sum(iif(tim.Accommodation = 1, atim.ActualTime, 0)) as IsKeyedInDynamics from Timesheet tim, analytics.datamartTimesheet atim where tim.Oid = atim.Oid","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":[]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Time Sheet
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Red is time that has not been set as keyed in Dynamics","WidgetType":"rangeselector","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#ffffff","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":12,"WidgetYPosition":0,"WidgetRows":12,"WidgetColumns":36,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"startDate":"2019/06/01","endDate":"2019/12/31","type":"year","visible":false},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select atim.[Date], sum(iif(tim.Accommodation = 0, atim.ActualTime, 0)) as IsNotInDynamics, 
sum(iif(tim.Accommodation = 1, atim.ActualTime, 0)) as IsInDynamics 
from Timesheet tim, analytics.datamartTimesheet atim 
where tim.Oid = atim.Oid 
--and atim.[Date] between @FromDate and @ToDate 
group by atim.[Date]","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":null}]
